hadiths.text: Narrated `Imran bin Husain:had piles, so I asked the Prophet (ﷺ) about the prayer. He said, "Pray while standing and if you can't, pray while sitting and if you cannot do even that, then pray Lying on your side

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا لَمْ يُطِقْ قَاعِدًا صَلَّى عَلَى جَنْبٍ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever cannot offer Salat while sitting, can offer Salat while lying on his side
